mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.electronics_seal_id AS "electronicsSealId", a.merchant_id AS "merchantId", a.merchant_company AS "merchantCompany", a.fee_amount AS "feeAmount", a.sys_resource AS "sysResource", a.seal_product AS "sealProduct", a.channel_code AS "channelCode", a.seal_type AS "sealType", a.status AS "status", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO electronics_seal_record( id, electronics_seal_id, merchant_id, merchant_company, fee_amount, sys_resource, seal_product, channel_code, seal_type, status, create_time, update_time, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{electronicsSealId}, #{merchantId}, #{merchantCompany}, #{feeAmount}, #{sysResource}, #{sealProduct}, #{channelCode}, #{sealType}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE electronics_seal_record SET electronics_seal_id = #{electronicsSealId}, merchant_id = #{merchantId}, merchant_company = #{merchantCompany}, fee_amount = #{feeAmount}, sys_resource = #{sysResource}, seal_product = #{sealProduct}, channel_code = #{channelCode}, seal_type = #{sealType}, status = #{status}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
